patch 8.2.0149: maintaining a Vim9 branch separately is more work

Problem:    Maintaining a Vim9 branch separately is more work.
Solution:   Merge the Vim9 script changes.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/673660ab00d808d1e96e7181a60c5c8545c0ee75|patch 8.2.0150: cannot define python function when using :execute>
patch 8.2.0150: cannot define python function when using :execute

Problem:    Cannot define python function when using :execute. (Yasuhiro
            Matsumoto)
Solution:   Do not recognize "def" inside "function.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0150: cannot define python function when using :execute · vim/vim@673660a
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0150: cannot define python function when using :execute · vim/vim@673660a
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot define python function when using :execute. (Yasuhiro Matsumoto) Solution: Do not recognize "def" inside "function.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/978d170bdce9c0a47e6683cd7c288bc2706f3fff|patch 8.2.0151: detecting a script was already sourced is unreliable>
patch 8.2.0151: detecting a script was already sourced is unreliable

Problem:    Detecting a script was already sourced is unreliable.
Solution:   Do not use the inode number.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0151: detecting a script was already sourced is unreliable · vim/vim@978d170
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0151: detecting a script was already sourced is unreliable · vim/vim@978d170
attachments.text: Problem: Detecting a script was already sourced is unreliable. Solution: Do not use the inode number.

patch 8.2.0152: restoring ctrl_x_mode is not needed

Problem:    Restoring ctrl_x_mode is not needed.
Solution:   Remove restoring the old value, it's changed again soon.

patch 8.2.0153: warning shows when listing version info

Problem:    Warning shows when listing version info.
Solution:   Use "-u NONE". (Ozaki Kiichi, closes #5534)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0153: warning shows when listing version info · vim/vim@b3de511

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/21b9e9773d64de40994f8762173bdd8befa6acf7|patch 8.2.0154: reallocating the list of scripts is inefficient>
patch 8.2.0154: reallocating the list of scripts is inefficient

Problem:    Reallocating the list of scripts is inefficient.
Solution:   Instead of using a growarray of scriptitem_T, store pointers and
            allocate each scriptitem_T separately.  Also avoids that the
            growarray pointers change when sourcing a new script.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0154: reallocating the list of scripts is inefficient · vim/vim@21b9e97

patch 8.2.0155: warnings from MinGW compiler; tests fail without +float

Problem:    Warnings from MinGW compiler. (John Marriott) Json test fails when
            building without +float feature.
Solution:   Init variables. Fix Json parsing. Skip a few tests that require
            the +float feature.

patch 8.2.0158: triggering CompleteDone earlier is not backwards compatible

Problem:    Triggering CompleteDone earlier is not backwards compatible.
            (Daniel Hahler)
Solution:   Add CompleteDonePre instead.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0158: triggering CompleteDone earlier is not backwards comp… · vim/vim@3f169ce
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0158: triggering CompleteDone earlier is not backwards comp… · vim/vim@3f169ce
